subject: Dearest Beloved,
body:
Dearest Beloved,
My name is Mrs. Mariam Nasser Al-Kharafi widow to late Nasser Al-Kharafi owner of major construction companies! in my country, and also my late husband Al-Kharafi had construction contracts in more than 30 countries worldwide. I am suffering from long time Cancer of the breast, and it is very obvious now that money cannot save me. So, i don’t deserve your pity rather prayers as i am dying soul. From all indications my condition is really deteriorating and it’s quite obvious that I won't live more than three months according to my doctors which i can still feel in my bones. I am currently at a hospital receiving treatment which is not improving. Beauty, Wealth and expensive things cannot save my life! , so i beg you to take this message serious and see me as your blood sister and assist me on this divine charity project. My late husband never presented me to his family because they hate me. Now they have taken over all his wealth. You can read more about it on this page.
Today, i have decided to donate some funds to the charity through you in your country, and that is why i am contacting you. It is legal and 100% risk free, so kindly contact me back if you are capable and honest to handle this project for me. I will tell you more about me when you reply to me.
Provide me with your information so i can send it to the bank as the new beneficiary and issue you a letter of authorization.
FULL NAMES: SEX: AGE:MARITAL STATUS:COUNTRY: CONTACT ADDRESS:PHONE NO#FAX NO# OCCUPATION: 
I.D C opy
:
Thanks
Mrs. Mariam Nasser Al-Kharafi

subject: Re: Dearest Beloved,
body:
Dear Mrs. Mariam Nasser,

Thank you for reaching out to me with your message. I'm sorry to hear about your condition and the difficulties you are facing. It must be a challenging time for you.

I would like to know more about this charity project that you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional details? What is the purpose of the project, and how can I assist you in it? Also, if you could share more information about yourself and your late husband, it would help me understand the situation better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Julie
